title: Haft Peykar's Turquoise Dome

description.text: Reimagined Haft Peykar's Turquoise Dome in Unity. Haft Peykar is a romantic epic by Persian poet Nizami Ganjavi written in 1197

content.caption: (The original concept was drawn by Mohammad Amin Farzinfar, be sure to check him out)

bulletPoints: Responsible for shaders, particles, level design and scripts
